title: Center for Integrative Oncology
cleaned_text: Center for Integrative Oncology We help identify which treatments have been scientifically validated as being safe and effective. About Us The mission of The Center for Integrative Oncology is to provide cancer patients with access to the best possible care and treatment options, including alternative, integrative, and complementary medicine. We are dedicated to investigating and reporting on clinics and treatments at medical institutions around the world, in order to provide patients with valuable information and resources that can help them on their journey to healing. Our goal is to empower patients with the knowledge and tools they need to make informed decisions about their care. We believe that every individual deserves the opportunity to explore all available treatment options, and we are committed to providing access to these options through our research and reporting efforts. Through our efforts, we hope to inspire and facilitate positive change in the field of cancer treatment and care. We believe that by working together, we can improve outcomes for patients and help them achieve their best possible quality of life. Our organization welcomes donations and support from individuals who share our vision and commitment to improving the lives of cancer patients through integrative and complementary medicine. Together, we can make a difference in the fight against cancer. By supporting The Center for Integrative Oncology, you can help us continue our mission of research into alternative, complementary, and integrative medicine resources to cancer patients around the world. Your donation can help us expand our network of healthcare professionals, increase our outreach efforts, and provide financial assistance to those in need. Since 2011 Aiding research into natural healing methods by providing funding, supporting clinical trials, offering education and training, launching advocacy and awareness campaigns, collaborating with healthcare institutions, and supporting patient care programs.
